title: LEGOⓇ Indiana Jones™: The Original Adventures
notes: Fix the sound loop with the startup parameters "PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 %command%"

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX Vega (VEGA10, DRM 3.27.0, 4.19.0-1-MANJARO, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: Played first level. Plays as well as any other LEGO game, Steam Controller works great but doesn't prevent screen from sleeping - have to disable screen sleep manually or bump mouse occasionally to prevent display sleep.
